name: RideShareCalculator
0:
”Alexa, ask ride calculator how many Ubers with 17 people.”
”Alexa, ask ride calculator how many Lyfts with 25 drunks.”
”Alexa, open ride calculator and get the number of Lyfts with 132 people.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ride calculator
des: An easy way to calculate how many Uber or Lyft cars you need to order! This is useful when you have a large group of people (e.g., a pregame before going out to bars) and need to figure out how many regular cars and XL cars to order from your favorite ride share service. It is assumed that you know the exact number of people that will be riding, and that those people are going to the same place.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
